fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Partner up with a player (Day)
- Control your partner (Night)
Attributes:
- You may use both abilities while alive or dead, you may only use your first ability once
- Your partner wins with you while you are alive, you have access to a night chat until both of you die
- You cannot control you partner after they die, but may control them if you are dead and they are not
- You do not know the identity of other Ghosts, and they do not know your identity
- If a Ghost attempts to attack you, their ability will fail
